document.title: Introduction
document.paragraph:
1Introduction
The organize favorites dialog provides a way of sorting the favorites.
/images/eiffelstudio/dialogs_and_wizards/favorites_dialog.png
The left part of this dialog is composed of a
../10_favorites_tree.xml tree representation of the favorites identical to the one in the
../00_introduction.xml favorites tool . With it, it is possible to
10_new_favorite_class.xml add classes and
20_create_folder.xml folders to the favorites or
40_remove_favorite.xml remove some , and also to
30_move_to_folder.xml spread the favorite classes among the favorite folders.
Caution: Since the favorites are project-wide, any modifications made in this dialog are reported in all development windows.
